|cpu1_cores = |cpu1_type = |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = |is_doc = |bus = 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none --> |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = STMicro;NAND128W3A2BN6; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5DS16M16CS-5T; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Infineon;ADM6996M; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = none |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = ADSL |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = |rad1modif = |rad1chip1cpu = |rad1chip1 = |rad1chip2 = |rad1chip3 = |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== There is a '''[[STMicroelectronics]]''' ST20184 ADSL2+ front end on-board. ==Links of Interest== *[http://bt2700hgv.tripod.com/ir1002700HGV.htm Unlocking BT 2Wire 2700HGV Business Hub (wireless router)] *[http://bt2700hgv.tripod.com/002.htm#Hardware Version There are multiple hardware revisions of this device.] :BT Dual SSID models broadcast SSIDs of '''BTBusinessHub-XXX''' and '''BT Fusion-XXXX''' (per this site and WiGLE). *[http://hackingbtbusinesshub.wordpress.com/2011/09/29/pcb-photo-of-2wire-2700hg-v/ PCB photo of 2Wire 2700HGV - Hacking the 2Wire] :[http://www.dd-wrt.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=30524&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=15 On the DD-WRT forums] [http://hackingbtbusinesshub.wordpress.com/2011/09/06/eyeballing-the-2wire-2700hgb-bt-businesshub-v2/ Eyeballing the 2Wire 2700HGV (BT BusinessHub t.2/v.2) - Hacking the 2Wire]
[http://hackingbtbusinesshub.wordpress.com/2011/09/12/the-2wire-family-of-tm32-cpus/ The family of TriMedia TM32 CPUs - Hacking the 2Wire] [[Category:English Documentation]]
